sentence.Network_en: He'd end up an exile washing dishes at the automat.
sentence.Network_cn: 到头来他会背井离乡,在自助食堂里洗碗碟.

sentence.Network_en: Then there are the luncheonette and the automat, which are somewhat like cafeteria.
sentence.Network_cn: 此外还有小型便餐馆及自助食堂, 它们都和自助餐馆相差无几.

sentence.Network_en: The automat system design and development complete source code, has been tested.
sentence.Network_cn: 该自动系统设计和开发完整的源代码, 已经过测试.

list.abs: ...。例如，像“我死后要将我的骨灰撒遍月球”这样一种遗嘱的单纯表达（sheer expression），并不自动地（automatically）意味着该遗嘱须得到法律上的尊重。一项法律规范指定在什么条件下遗嘱具有法律效力。因而，规范在逻辑上先于.
automatically becomes head of the student activities committee ., 都会自然而然的成为学生会的头儿.
...ear）的选项，选你要用的手动（manual）或是自动（automatic）就行了。
(A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... auto n. (口语)汽车 automatic a. 自动的；机械的 automation n. 自动，自动化.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (denoting an automaton): from German, from French automate, from Latin automaton (see automaton). The current sense dates from the early 20th cent

means.word_mean: 1. a vending machine from which you can get food
2. a cafeteria where food is served from machines

auth_sentence.content: Then everyone separates, except for the young woman from "Automat" and an interpolated young man.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then everyone separates, except for the young woman from "Automat" and an interpolated young man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then everyone separates, except for the young woman from "Automat" and an interpolated young man.

auth_sentence.content: For two years he was a grief Automat, crying unstoppably at the mention of her name.
auth_sentence.res_content: For two years he was a grief Automat, crying unstoppably at the mention of her name.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For two years he was a grief Automat, crying unstoppably at the mention of her name.
